channel.title: Help changing background on trisidiax client
channel.description: i cant seem to find out how to change the background of this server can some one please leave a tut

item.title: Help changing background on trisidiax client
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

purecoolbow:

i cant seem to find out how to change the background of this CLIENT* server can some one please leave a tut

It seems you must learn more about Java before jumping straight into RSPS’s. I would advise doing that before you start posting thousands of help threads for simple things.

Read full topic
item.source: Help changing background on trisidiax client

item.title: Help changing background on trisidiax client
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

purecoolbow:

i cant seem to find out how to change the background of this server can some one please leave a tut

Navigate to your C:/ drive.
Find the Trisidia Cache. (usually .TrisidiaXCache)
Open it.
Open the sprites folder.
Open the login folder.
Should be “background.png”

[hr]
OR:
Navigate to your user home (C:\Users\YOURNAMEHERE)
Find the Trisidia Cache. (usually .TrisidiaXCache)
Open it.
Open the sprites folder.
Open the login folder.
Should be “background.png”

Read full topic
item.source: Help changing background on trisidiax client
